name: Screwing Around
description:
Screwing around is a local-multiplayer Coop-game where 4 people continually fix a giant machine. Use giant physics-based tools to repair giant damages, all the while flying around with jetpacks.

Made by:
- Nils Gawlik (Dev) (https://nilsgawlik.itch.io/)
- Johannes Knop (Dev)
- Laura Brosi (Art)
- THORTEN! (Art)
- John Kees (Dev)
